meanings.definition: The quality of being stylish and elegant.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded classiness at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always carries herself with such classiness.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the classiness of the peacock.
meanings.sent4: The classiness of the sunset took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The classiness of the hotel made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: Elegance and sophistication in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The ballroom was filled with classiness and grace.
meanings.sent2: His speech was filled with a sense of classiness.
meanings.sent3: The penguin waddled with surprising classiness.
meanings.sent4: Her words were dripping with classiness and charm.
meanings.sent5: The classiness of the mansion was unmatched in the neighborhood.
